name: HOGWASH
description:
A physics based puzzler where you need to roll a dice to get turns to smash a block to drop a beam to swap an animal to get to the bath and have a shower... that's it.

A game initially made for the KENNEY JAM 2019 game jam but is going to undergo a make over and be released properly later in the year, so a very much in the early stages of development.
